metadata.name: A Mind Is Born
metadata.description: This is the official NFT representing the artwork 'A Mind Is Born'. The owner of this NFT is the only person who is able to display the real version of the artwork in any VR worlds that support the ERC721 token standard. This includes displaying it as a video and in the form of the original source code. The original source code that generates the full composition on a Commodore 64 computer can be accessed by calling the sourceCode() function on the ethereum smart contract for this NFT.
